This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 673 Sq.
Ft.
Elevate at Red Rocks offers spacious one, two, and three bedroom apartments nestled in the foothills of the Rocky Mountains.
Only minutes away from downtown Denver, the community is in close proximity to numerous parks, shopping destinations, restaurants, and entertainment.
Residents can enjoy a dip in the pool, take a stroll with their dog around the community or take a short drive to enjoy the nearby countryside.
Whether it’s the fast pace of city life or a relaxing mountain atmosphere you’re looking for, Elevate at Red Rocks has something for everyone.
Features:
Garage, Dishwasher, Air Conditioner Balcony Ceiling Fan Heat Patio Washer/Dryer, Range, Disposal, Window Coverings, Cable/Satellite, Package Receiving, Refrigerator
Community Amenities:

On-Site Management, Playground, Free Weights Available, Business Center Clubhouse Fitness Center Night Patrol Pets Allowed Pool TV Lounge Online Payments Available, Accept Credit Card Payments, Garage, Public Transportation, Storage, Carport, Street Parking, Accepts Electronic Payments and Service Requests, On-Site Maintenance
Pet Policy
Some breed restrictions ask for details
Income Requirements:
2.5 times the monthly rent
